Ambassador Package¶

Submodules

ambassador.eicar module¶

class ambassador.eicar.EicarAmbassador(client, testing=0, chains={'home'})¶

Bases: polyswarmclient.ambassador.Ambassador

Ambassador which submits the EICAR test file

next_bounty(chain)¶

Submit either the EICAR test string or a benign sample

Parameters:chain (str) – Chain sample is being requested from
Returns:Tuple of amount, ipfs_uri, duration, None to terminate submission

amount (int): Amount to place this bounty for ipfs_uri (str): IPFS URI of the artifact to post duration (int): Duration of the bounty in blocks
Return type:(int, str, int)
